conclusion: Analyze the paths and directions of the liquid flow from points A, B, and C.
Liquid from A flows downward and to the left.
Liquid from B flows downward and to the right.
Liquid from C flows downward and to the right.
Liquid from A flows downward and to the left, passing through the green baffle and eventually reaching container D.
Liquid from B flows downward and to the right, passing through the purple baffle and eventually reaching container E.
Liquid from C flows downward and to the right, passing through the brown baffle and eventually reaching container F.
Liquid from A flows into container D.
Liquid from B flows into container E.
Liquid from C flows into container F.
Final answer: A flows into D, B flows into E, C flows into F.
